com.techelevator.tenmo.services
 

  • Uses of AuthenticatedUser in com.techelevator.tenmo.services

    Methods in com.techelevator.tenmo.services that return AuthenticatedUser
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AuthenticatedUser
    AuthenticationService.login(UserCredentials credentials)
     
    Methods in com.techelevator.tenmo.services with parameters of type AuthenticatedUser
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    TransferService.createTransfer(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, Transfer trans)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, passes the token to a new Entity which contains the passed-in transfer, and then POSTs the authenticated transfer to the database.
    Account
    AccountService.getAccountById(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int accId)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns an account based on the passed-in account ID.
    Account
    AccountService.getAccountByUserId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int userId)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns accounts associated with the passed-in user ID.
    Transfer[]
    TransferService.getAllTransfers(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns all the logged-in user's transfer records.
    User[]
    UserService.getAllUsers(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns all registered users to the specified endpoint.
    double
    AccountService.getBalance(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the current user, and the user's token passed by the authenticatedUser object.
    Transfer[]
    TransferService.getPendingTransfersByUserId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int id)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns all the current user's pending transfers based on the user's ID.
    Transfer
    TransferService.getTransferFromId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int id)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a transfer based on the passed-in transfer ID.
    TransferType
    TransferTypeService.getTransferFromId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int transId)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a transfer's type based on the transfer's type ID.
    Transfer[]
    TransferService.getTransfersFromUserId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int userId)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns transfers associated with the user's ID.
    TransferStatus
    TransferStatusService.getTransferStatusByDesc(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, String desc)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a transfer's status based on the filtered description passed into the desc parameter.
    TransferStatus
    TransferStatusService.getTransferStatusbyId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int id)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a transfer's status based on the transfer's status ID.
    TransferType
    TransferTypeService.getTransferType(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, String desc)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a transfer's type based on the filtered description passed into the desc parameter.
    User
    UserService.getUserById(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int id)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a specific user based on the ID passed to the endpoint.
    void
    TransferService.updateTransfer(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, Transfer transfer)
    Deprecated.
